entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
